title: User-Centric Data Access Control with Granular Permission Settings for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to have granular permission settings for accessing my clients' health data so that I can ensure their privacy is respected while still being able to monitor their health effectively.

title: Intuitive User Interface Design – Simplified Navigation for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a simplified client management dashboard so that I can efficiently track multiple clients' health status and manage care schedules without confusion.

title: Real-Time Health Data Synchronization – Instant Updates for Care Management
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive real-time updates from health monitoring devices so that I can effectively track my clients' health status and respond to any anomalies while ensuring their privacy and minimizing stress.

title: Comprehensive User Training Resources
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want step-by-step guides for common tasks so that I can efficiently manage multiple clients' health monitoring and communication without complicated setup or training.

title: Multi-Channel Notification System – Push Notifications for Health Alerts
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a reliable multi-channel notification system that allows me to receive health alerts for my clients so that I can monitor their health status efficiently and intervene when necessary without alarming them unnecessarily.

title: Cross-Platform Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to integrate with third-party health applications to monitor multiple clients' health metrics seamlessly so that I can track their well-being in real-time while ensuring data privacy and clarity.

title: Adaptive Interface for Caregiver Usability
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want an adaptive interface that learns from my preferences and provides a simplified client management dashboard so that I can efficiently monitor multiple clients' health status while ensuring clarity and privacy.
